text: Tapa'ile bhanidinus h ‘‘he manisaharu! Ma timiharu sabaiko lagi tyasa allahabata patha'i'eko rasula (sandesta) hum jo akasaharu ra dhartiko rajyako svami ho. Usa baheka kohi satya pujya chaina, usaile jivana pradana gardacha ra usaile prana lincha. Tasartha allahamathi imana lya'u ra usako nabi um'mima, jo svayam mahana allaha ra usaka adesama astha rakhdachan. Unako anusarana gara taki timi (sahi) marga pa'una saka.’’
